parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Automatically switch off first channel after
parameter.description: If not zero, automatically switch off after a user defined time

parameter.name: config_22_2
parameter.label: 22: Automatically switch off second channel after
parameter.description: If not zero, automatically switch off after a user defined time

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Function of RF off command on first channel
parameter.description: Defines how to interpret RF first channel Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function: Ignore - to switch on the light by motion detectors and switch it off after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to switch the light off that would break logics; Switch on - to switch on the light on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and switch it off after some amount of time. Button off click will still work (if button operations are not disabled).

options.option: Switch on if load is off else switch off

parameter.name: config_23_1
parameter.label: 23: Function of RF off command on second channel
parameter.description: Defines how to interpret RF second channel Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function: Ignore - to switch on the light by motion detectors and switch it off after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to switch the light off that would break logics; Switch on - to switch on the light on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and switch it off after some amount of time. Button off click will still work (if button operations are not disabled).

options.option: Switch on if load is off else switch off

parameter.name: config_16_1
parameter.label: 16: What to do on button Down press (for both channels)
parameter.description: Defines how to interpret button Down press. Depends on parameters 12 and 32 "Switch by buttons" parameter. If not Disabled this parameter will affect the action selected by the latter parameter. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function.

options.option: Switch On if load is Off, else switch Off

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Switch on/off by holding buttons
parameter.description: Defines if the switch should change it state to on/off if buttons are being hold.

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Restore switch state after power cycle
parameter.description: Defines if the switch should restore switch state to the last state prior to device power off (power cycle).

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Invert buttons
parameter.description: Allows for exchanging ON and OFF.

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Switch by buttons (first channel)
parameter.description: If disabled, the local operations by buttons will not switch relay on first channel, but only send commands to On/Off association group. In this mode buttons are not linked with the switch anymore. They can be used separately: buttons to control remote device, switch will operate by RF commands only.

parameter.name: config_32_1
parameter.label: 32: Switch by buttons (second channel)
parameter.description: If disabled, the local operations by buttons will not switch relay on second channel, but only send commands to On/Off association group. In this mode buttons are not linked with the switch anymore. They can be used separately: buttons to control remote device, switch will operate by RF commands only.

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Action on button single press or hold
parameter.description: Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic and Scene Activation commands are sent to Association group. Use Scene Controller Conf to set up Scene ID for Scene Activation. Switch All commands are sent broadcast.

options.option: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Action on button double press or hold
parameter.description: Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic and Scene Activation commands are sent to Association group. Use Scene Controller Conf to set up Scene ID for Scene Activation. Switch All commands are sent broadcast.

options.option: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)

parameter.name: config_20_2
parameter.label: 20: Energy consumption for first channel
parameter.description: Specify the consumption of the load in watts, for the calculation of power consumption. Max load 1800 W.

parameter.name: config_40_2
parameter.label: 40: Energy consumption for second channel
parameter.description: Specify the consumption of the load in watts, for the calculation of power consumption. Max load 1800 W.
